property.name: createMafFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.maf ( maf_id, bio_data_item_id, reference_genome_id, index_id, real_path, compressed ) VALUES ( :MAF_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID, :INDEX_ID, :REAL_PATH, :COMPRESSED )

property.name: loadMafFileQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
m.maf_id, m.reference_genome_id as maf_reference_genome_id, m.compressed as maf_compressed, m.real_path as maf_real_path,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.maf m JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON m.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = m.index_id WHERE m.maf_id = ?
